Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory198.png'}
{3: 'On the way back to the temporary camp, An Jie maintains her silence. Only when passing the cliff marked with broken trails of blood does she come to a halt.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'An Jie', 3: '...They threw my deputy off this cliff here...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'An Jie', 3: 'If you find his body while clearing the mine tunnel, please give him a proper burial for me.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She holds no particular attachment to her deputy. Like all her previous deputies, this one was merely a more efficient human tool to her.'}
{3: "But they didn't deserve to die like this."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: 'We will give proper burial to every body we find in the mine tunnels.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Despite her cold gaze and clear distaste for the woman, Bridget doesn't refuse An Jie's request."}
{1: '1', 2: 'An Jie', 3: "...Thank you. I know you're all good people.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Trojan', 3: "Heh, playing the saint now, are we? We really don't mind if you just tell us what you want, you know.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'An Jie falls silent once more.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory696.jpg'}
{3: 'After entering the corridor lined with laboratories, she finds herself unable to identify which one belonged to the professor.'}
{3: "With the Kurono soldiers' hostility growing more palpable behind her, An Jie carefully tests each door ahead."}
{3: 'One, two, three...'}
{3: "Knowing she has no chance of outpacing the Kurono soldiers' weapons, she's too scared to make any sudden moves."}
{1: '1', 2: 'An Jie', 3: "None of these. The access card isn't working.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Her face remains expressionless as she informs the Kurono soldiers of the bad news, her fingers tightening around the access card in her hand.'}
{3: 'While researchers from Norman Mining Corp are able to access a few public laboratories with the access cards they have, An Jie has this other access card that she got from her professor.'}
{3: 'And through subtle probing along the way, An Jie is now sure that these two Kurono soldiers are unaware of that particular card.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kurono Soldier A', 3: 'Darn it. I guess we have to keep moving.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The damp environment poses a threat to these incomplete Constructs, machines built solely for combat.'}
{2: 'Kurono Soldier A', 3: 'How did we end up getting stuck with this damn mission...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kurono Soldier B', 3: "Now, don't try anything funny.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'He prods An Jie with his weapon as a warning.'}

{1: '1', 2: 'An Jie', 3: "I'm sure you know that researchers from Norman Mining Corp don't have enough clearance to access everywhere. I might be the person in charge, but this is the only access card I've been given.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Just a little further back... just a little more...', 3: '60'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Just a little further back... just a little more...'}
{2: 'An Jie', 3: "We can only access the public labs, and we'll use them to hack into the private lab's terminal. I'll get what I need, and you'll be able to go home.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Here...? Wait, not yet. Go a little further...', 3: '60'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Here...? Wait, not yet. Go a little further...'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kurono Soldier B', 3: 'Humph.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'The soldiers accept her explanation quietly, slowing their pace and letting her work alone at the front with the access card to open the door.'}
{3: 'The stiffness in their joints is real. Without waterproof equipment, both Construct soldiers are having a rough time.'}
{2: 'Kurono Soldier A', 3: 'Who the **** would know to bring waterproof gear? How the **** were we supposed to know the mine would be this damn humid...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'An Jie stands perfectly still, maintaining her pose as if merely testing the access card, and presses it against the wall—'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryError.prefab', 2: '1'}
{3: 'Beep—beep—beep—'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The moment she presses it, alarms blare throughout the area, and infrared targeting dots appear on the two Kurono Constructs standing in the corridor.'}
{3: 'Ignoring their stiff joints, the Kurono soldiers instantly raise their weapons at An Jie.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryError.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiDoorClose01.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: "But it's too late—the cold, bulletproof metal door slams shut before them with a heavy thud."}
{3: 'She listens coldly to the sharp clangs of thermal weapons striking against metal behind the door—until she hears two dull thuds that signal bodies hitting the ground in quick succession.'}
{3: "She doesn't look back."}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiDoorClose01.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory345.jpg'}
{3: 'For the rest of the journey, only heavy footsteps echo through the mining tunnel.'}
{3: 'Kurono soldiers... secret laboratory... the mining tunnel they just passed...'}
{1: '1', 3: "Bridget isn't the only one who's unsettled—since entering the Konstantin Mine, Trojan has grown distant and distracted as well."}
{3: 'For reasons unknown, everything here feels strangely familiar to her.'}
{3: "This isn't mere deja vu—she's certain that she's experienced all of these before."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory423.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Leonardo', 3: "Sure, we picked you up from the Konstantin Mine, but... I couldn't find any records of your background before that.", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Leonardo', 3: "I couldn't find any detailed reasons why Norman Mining Corp recruited you in the first place. There's just one report mentioning that you used to work at Norman Mining Corp's Konstantin Mine.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Leonardo', 3: "And what's more...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Leonardo puts away the old paper report, now wearing his usual impish grin.'}
{2: 'Leonardo', 3: "I think you're just fine the way you are now, auntie.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Leonardo', 3: 'So, do you really have to get involved with the new mission to excavate the Konstantin Mine?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Gazing out the window, Trojan falls into an unusual daze.'}
{2: 'Trojan', 3: "I can't shake this feeling that I've got to go to that place.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Trojan', 3: "Someone has to go anyway, so it might as well be me... Hey, Boss, shouldn't you be happy when an employee volunteers for work?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Leonardo', 3: 'Happy about what? About having to pay you an extra fieldwork allowance?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Trojan', 3: "Just send the mission details to me. I'll handle everything else myself. Bye!", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory345.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: 'While she might not be a time traveler, her remarkably simple background points to only one thing...'}
{3: 'She does have a history with the Konstantin Mine.'}
